question: Cornwall, the host of this yearâ€™s G-7 Summit, is located in which country?
explanation:
The G-7 Summit of this year is to be held in Cornwall, a peninsular country in the south-west region of the United Kingdom, during June 11 to 13.
Being the President of G-7 this year, the United Kingdom has extended its invitation to India, Australia and South Korea to participate in the Summit as Guest countries. The Heads of Government of member states, and the representatives of the EU, usually meet at the G7 Summit.
